biotools.summary: MoViES (Molecular Vibrations Evaluation Server) allows the computation of the vibrational and thermal fluctuations dynamics for the chemical bonds of biomolecules.  The server takes as input a structure file in PDB format and returns results by email.  Analysis of vibrational motions and thermal fluctuational dynamics can give insights into the functional properties of both proteins and nucleic acids.
